channel.title: [PI]Variables
channel.description:
I've been trying to get the value of an integer variable from my source to my client. This is what I have:
In client.java: [code]String s = entityDef.name; s = s + combatDiffColor(myPlayer.combatLevel, entityDef.combatLevel) + (myPlayer.title);[/code]
In Player.java: [code]public int title; title = stream.readUnsignedByte();[/code]
In the source, I have an integer named title in Player.java
Could anyone help me out please? I'm probably way off.

item.title: [PI]Variables
item.dc:creator: @storyland storyland
item.description:
@storyland wrote:

I’ve been trying to get the value of an integer variable from my source to my client. This is what I have:

In client.java:

String s = entityDef.name; s = s + combatDiffColor(myPlayer.combatLevel, entityDef.combatLevel) + (myPlayer.title);

In Player.java:

public int title; title = stream.readUnsignedByte();

In the source, I have an integer named title in Player.java

Could anyone help me out please? I’m probably way off.

Read full topic
